name: Office Ninja (ethanmogreg)
description:
Description

This game involves a ninja who has abandoned his former life to work at an office due to the ninja lifestyle no longer being sustainable in the modern age. As soon as he starts his workday, his "extremely busy" and impatient boss demands he gets him some coffee. Ninja isn't very well adapted to his new job yet, so asking his co-workers for information could be very useful. 

Key skills

There is a lot of conditional dialogue, so conversations change depending on what the player has experienced so far. The game to attempts to re-create an office space using various sounds, animations and props. The attention to detail will also help make conversations more engaging, with different camera angles. The player may discover side quests from either exploring or taking hints from other NPC's, though these aren't required for the main quest. 

Controls

The controls are standard WASD. They can either walk or run by holding shift. To open the quest log, the player can press "J" to keep track of what they have to do.
